QuestionDataCategorySelection.name: QuestionDataCategorySelection
QuestionDataCategorySelection.description: A data category selection represents a data category that classifies a question.

DataCategoryGroupName.description: Unique name of the data category group which has a category associated with the question.

DataCategoryName.description: Unique name of the data category associated with the question.

ParentId.description: ID of the question associated with the data category selection.
